scripts.upload: python increment_version.py && rm -rf dist/ botasaurus.egg-info botasaurus/botasaurus_storage.json  MANIFEST  && python setup.py sdist && pip install -e . && python -m twine upload dist/* --verbose && pip install  -e . && npm run reload-pypi
scripts.local-install: rm -rf dist/ botasaurus.egg-info botasaurus/botasaurus_storage.json MANIFEST && python setup.py sdist && pip install -e .
scripts.reload-pypi: python -m pip uninstall botasaurus -y && python -m pip install botasaurus --upgrade && npm run local-install
